name: TRM
description: Hold $TRM = Earn USDT Reward Mechanism: A 5% tax is applied to every transaction and redistributed automatically as USDT rewards to eligible holders. Hold at least 100K TRM to receive rewards. A revolutionary token designed to bring you stable, automatic rewards in the ever-changing crypto market. This fee is automatically converted into USDT and distributed among holders who maintain a balance of at least 100K TRM.
